---
title: "/drop"

<!-- This file is generated by scripts/wiki/renderCommandsDoc.ts. -->

[‚Üê Back to commands index](./)

Drop items from your bank.

**Usage**

- `/drop [items:<string>] [filter:<string>] [search:<string>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `items` | `string` | No | The item you want to drop. | - |
| `filter` | `string` | No | The filter you want to use. | - |
| `search` | `string` | No | A search query for items in your bank to drop. | - |

**Examples**

- `/drop items:10 trout, 5 coal`
